summary: We all love Belrand the strong, protective and silent type.  Please think of this simple mod as younger version of him.  This is NOT an complete overhaul, the essence of what he was is still very much there it\'s now just tweaked a little.
descriptionHtml:
We all love Belrand the strong, protective and silent type.  Please think of this simple mod as younger version of him.  This is NOT an complete overhaul, the essence of what he was is still very much there it\'s now just tweaked a little.

Simple Changes include more hair, facial hair, different brows and also now marked essential. 

(He hasnâ€™t died on me yet the tough old goat.)

Requirements: Hire him for 500 coin
Location: Solitude usually at the Winking Skeever

Install him by placing his file in the following location:
Program Files (x86) > Steam > SteamApps > common > skyrim > Data >

Issues?  Problems?  Let me know. 
(yes I forget to include the .bsa file very sorry about that and hope this update works out any issues.)

(Credits: This mod was made possible by using Skyrim NPC editor 0.75.1.  Thank you foretrenty!)

First Mod hope you like it :)
author: CeaseSphire
